languages.text: "Дарственная на корабль, который ты мне подарил{mf||а}, тоже тут. Конечно, он вряд ли будет так же прибылен с новым капитаном, но было славно владеть собственным судном".
"The deed to the ship you gave me is here as well. It won't be as profitable under a new captain, of course, but it was wonderful to have command of my own vessel."
languages.original_text: "Дарственная на корабль, который ты мне подарил{mf||а}, тоже тут. Конечно, он вряд ли будет так же прибылен с новым капитаном, но было славно владеть собственным судном".

traits.locale_text: "The deed to the ship you gave me is here as well. It won't be as profitable under a new captain, of course, but it was wonderful to have command of my own vessel."
"The deed to the ship you gave me is here as well. It won't be as profitable under a new captain, of course, but it was wonderful to have command of my own vessel."
"The deed to the ship you gave me is here as well. It won't be as profitable under a new captain, of course, but it was wonderful to have command of my own vessel."
"The deed to the ship you gave me is here as well. It won't be as profitable under a new captain, of course, but it was wonderful to have command of my own vessel."

languages.text: “你送给我的船契也在这里。当然，换了船长之后，它恐怕不会再像这样赚钱了。不过，我也算是开过我自己的船了，那真是段美妙的时光。”
languages.original_text: "The deed to the ship you gave me is here as well. It won't be as profitable under a new captain, of course, but it was wonderful to have command of my own vessel."

traits.locale_text: “你送给我的船契也在这里。当然，换了船长之后，它恐怕不会再像这样赚钱了。不过，我也算是开过我自己的船了，那真是段美妙的时光。”

languages.text: 「アンタがくれた船の証書もここにある。もちろん、新しい船長のもとではそれほど儲からないだろうけど、自分の船を指揮できるのは素晴らしいことだったよ」
languages.original_text: "The deed to the ship you gave me is here as well. It won't be as profitable under a new captain, of course, but it was wonderful to have command of my own vessel."

traits.locale_text: 「アンタがくれた船の証書もここにある。もちろん、新しい船長のもとではそれほど儲からないだろうけど、自分の船を指揮できるのは素晴らしいことだったよ」

languages.text: «Las escrituras de la nave que me cedió también están aquí. No resultará tan lucrativa con otro capitán, como es lógico, pero comandar mi propia nave fue maravilloso mientras duró».
languages.original_text: "The deed to the ship you gave me is here as well. It won't be as profitable under a new captain, of course, but it was wonderful to have command of my own vessel."

traits.locale_text: «Las escrituras de la nave que me cedió también están aquí. No resultará tan lucrativa con otro capitán, como es lógico, pero comandar mi propia nave fue maravilloso mientras duró».

languages.text: « J'ai aussi rapporté l'acte de propriété du vaisseau que vous m'aviez offert. Il sera bien moins rentable avec un nouveau capitaine, bien sûr, mais j'ai pris grand plaisir à commander mon propre appareil. »
languages.original_text: "The deed to the ship you gave me is here as well. It won't be as profitable under a new captain, of course, but it was wonderful to have command of my own vessel."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai aussi rapporté l'acte de propriété du vaisseau que vous m'aviez offert. Il sera bien moins rentable avec un nouveau capitaine, bien sûr, mais j'ai pris grand plaisir à commander mon propre appareil. »

languages.text: "Und auch die Besitzurkunde des Schiffs ist dabei. Natürlich wird es unter einem neuen Captain weniger profitabel sein, aber ich fand es klasse, Kommando über mein eigenes Schiff zu haben."
languages.original_text: "The deed to the ship you gave me is here as well. It won't be as profitable under a new captain, of course, but it was wonderful to have command of my own vessel."

traits.locale_text: "Und auch die Besitzurkunde des Schiffs ist dabei. Natürlich wird es unter einem neuen Captain weniger profitabel sein, aber ich fand es klasse, Kommando über mein eigenes Schiff zu haben."

languages.text: "Bana verdiğin geminin ruhsatı da burada. Yeni bir kaptan ile o kadar da kâr getirmeyecektir elbette ama kendi gemimi komuta etmek yine de harikaydı."
languages.original_text: "The deed to the ship you gave me is here as well. It won't be as profitable under a new captain, of course, but it was wonderful to have command of my own vessel."

traits.locale_text: "Bana verdiğin geminin ruhsatı da burada. Yeni bir kaptan ile o kadar da kâr getirmeyecektir elbette ama kendi gemimi komuta etmek yine de harikaydı."
